entry.value: microformats.org at 7 Last week the microformats.org community celebrated its 7th birthday at a gathering hosted by Mozilla in San Francisco and recognized accomplishments, challenges, and opportunities. The microformats tagline “humans first, machines second” forms the basis of many of our principles, and in that regard, we’d like to recognize a few people and thank them for their years of volunteer service Updated June 25th, 2012 by Tantek

name: microformats.org at 7

Last week the microformats.org community 
                celebrated its 7th birthday at a gathering hosted by Mozilla in 
                San Francisco and recognized accomplishments, challenges, and 
                opportunities.

            The microformats tagline “humans first, machines second” 
                forms the basis of many of our 
                principles, and 
                in that regard, we’d like to recognize a few people and 
                thank them for their years of volunteer service
